subject: [LSF/MM/BPF TOPIC][RFC PATCH v4 00/27] Private Memory Nodes (w/ Compressed RAM)

reviews.author: Gregory Price
reviews.summary: Expressed concerns about generalizing DRM's infrastructure and suggested exploring alternative approaches for memory management. Proposed using Private-CMA to create service-dedicated memory pools directly from DRAM.

2026-02-25.patch_summary: Private Memory Nodes (w/ Compressed RAM) patch series, focusing on memory management and allocation for specific services.
